body_html:
Have you build caffe2 from source and add the lib path to LD_LIBRARY_PATH?

export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/path/to/caffe2/build/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH

Try remove (not to add) the lib path of your own build caffe2 in LD_LIBRARY_PATH?

PS. I recommend not do add any extra path in $LD_LIBRARY_PATH, add manually when you need.
body_text:
Have you build caffe2 from source and add the lib path to LD_LIBRARY_PATH?

export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/path/to/caffe2/build/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH

PS. I recommend not do add any extra path in $LD_LIBRARY_PATH, add manually when you need.
body:
Have you build caffe2 from source and add the lib path to `LD_LIBRARY_PATH`?

 > `export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/path/to/caffe2/build/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH`

Try remove (not to add) the lib path of your own build caffe2 in `LD_LIBRARY_PATH`?

PS. I recommend not do add any extra path in $LD_LIBRARY_PATH, add manually when you need.
